attributes.additional_details:
This petition requests that Hastings Borough Council

1) Does not overlook St Mary in the Castle as it  juggles with its priorities over cultural events in the borough

2)  Volunteer stakeholders have more say - friends of SMIC need to be encouraged and allowed to keep a much closer eye on what the Council is doing

3) Take measures to ensure better continuity in strategy over the longer term, building on the achievements of Barbara Rogers over the last 3 years.  – the Council should see to it that Barbara is employed as a consultant to advise and train any future manager of SMIC and help Council officers with some of the issues.

4)  The Council and stakeholders (friends) work together to see that the tenant is the right one for the job and is facilitating public use adequately.
